column5: If HDTV & Pinterest had a little affair baby, this would be it! Tucked away in a cute little backyard in Austin, this remodeled 80sqft vintage camper is a one-of-a-kind experience you gotta try! Rebuilt with modern amenities this thing has everything you need. It even has a shared fire pit and its own outdoor movie theatre! Visiting for the first time? Get a taste of the true \
